org.mrcp4j.client
Interface MrcpMessageHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
MrcpChannel
public interface MrcpMessageHandler

The listener interface for processing MRCPv2 messages (for internal library use only).

This interface is intended for internal use by the MRCP4J implementation code. It should not be implemented by MRCP clients interested in registering to be notified of MRCP events. For that purpose please see MrcpEventListener instead.

Author:
Niels Godfredsen <ngodfredsen@users.sourceforge.net>

Method Summary
 void handleMessage(MrcpMessage message)
          Called when an MRCP message is received from an MRCP resource.
